name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior PHP Engineer with 9+ years of hands-on experience in developing high-performance web applications using **PHP**, **JavaScript**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in testing frameworks such as **PHPUnit** and adept at implementing **End-to-End testing** strategies to ensure code quality and reliability. Strong familiarity with **GitLab** for version control and integration processes, and experienced in utilizing **AWS CloudWatch** for monitoring and optimizing application performance. Demonstrated ability to leverage **AI Tools** for enhancing application capabilities and driving continuous improvement. Proven track record of collaborating effectively across teams and leading successful development projects while optimizing workflows and delivering robust, scalable solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed and maintained web applications utilizing **PHP** and **JavaScript**, ensuring high performance and responsiveness for various services.
Designed and implemented user interfaces using **React**, enhancing user engagement and satisfaction metrics.
Conducted End-to-End testing utilizing **PHPUnit**, leading to a decrease in bug rates by 30% in software releases.
Optimized application code quality by implementing code reviews and continuous improvement practices, resulting in a 20% reduction in technical debt.
Implemented version control strategies using **GitLab**, improving collaboration and deployment efficiencies across the development team.
Leveraged **Node.js** to build scalable network applications, improving server response time by 15%.
Monitored application performance and logs using **AWS CloudWatch**, helping to proactively address performance bottlenecks.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to integrate AI tools and enhance application capabilities, boosting feature adoption rates by 25%.
Executed comprehensive testing protocols to ensure high code quality, increasing the stability of deployments by 40%.
Strategized development workflows for continuous delivery, reducing overall time-to-market for new features by 20%.

• Developed and maintained high-quality PHP applications with **PHP** and **JavaScript**, leading to a measurable improvement in code quality and overall system performance.
• Created and executed End-to-End testing strategies using **PHPUnit** to ensure application reliability and functionality, achieving a **30% reduction** in bugs before production.
• Led collaborative projects utilizing **React** and **Node.js** for dynamic user interfaces, resulting in a **20% increase** in user satisfaction ratings.
• Implemented CI/CD practices with **GitLab**, enhancing deployment efficiency and reducing integration issues by **25%**.
• Leveraged **AWS CloudWatch** to monitor application performance and optimize server utilization, contributing to a **15% reduction** in operational costs.
• Utilized AI Tools to automate repetitive tasks and improve workflow, enabling team members to focus on higher-value tasks.
• Advocated for continuous improvement through regular code reviews and mentoring sessions, improving team productivity by **10%**.
• Ensured adherence to code quality standards and implemented best practices for scalable software solutions.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and timelines, ensuring successful and timely project delivery.

Utilized **PHP** and **JavaScript** to develop and maintain high-performance applications, improving code efficiency by **30%**.
Implemented **React** for dynamic user interfaces, resulting in a **40%** enhancement in user engagement metrics.
Conducted **End-to-End testing** using **PHPUnit**, ensuring robust application functionality and reducing bug reports by **25%**.
Developed automated testing frameworks and performed regular code reviews, significantly boosting **Code Quality** and compliance with best practices.
Integrated **Node.js** services with existing architectures to optimize backend processes, achieving a **15%** reduction in server response times.
Utilized **GitLab** for version control and CI/CD pipelines, streamlining application deployment and collaboration among team members.
Monitored application performance and logs using **AWS CloudWatch**, leading to proactive adjustments and increased system reliability by **20%**.
Leveraged **AI Tools** to enhance predictive analytics features, improving decision-making capabilities within applications.
Fostered a culture of **Continuous Improvement** by identifying areas for enhancement in application processes and team workflow.
Engaged in daily standups and collaborative sessions to align project goals and share insights, promoting team cohesion.
